title: Chilli beef cornbread pies
description: Freshly baked cornbread is a great accompaniment to stews and chilli, and this recipe combines the two elements in one golden, bubbling dish. Shin of beef is a very economical cut – it needs a long cook to make it tender, but you’ll be rewarded with a fantastic depth of flavour.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need  4–6 deep, individual pie dishes.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz shin of beef, trimmed and cut into 1cm/½in cubes
1 x 400g/14oz tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed
3 large roasted red peppers from a jar, deseeded and roughly chopped
115g/4oz unsalted butter, melted and slightly cooled
1 green chilli, deseeded and very finely chopped
